main.bio: Behind me I have internship(5 months) and some projects. I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from desing, to HTML + CSS + JS, all the way to backend side(node.js). With every line of code, I strive to make the web a beautiful place.

education.school: Faculty of Technical Sciences, University of Novi Sad

work.title: Junior Full-stack developer
work.description: As a member of an agile team as part of my internship program at MQ Quality Software Solutions doo worked on development of real person recommendations for travelers Web app. Main responsibilities: React components development External API integration Testing Technology: MERN Stack

projects.title: Full auth with MERN Stack
projects.category: This app will allow users to register & login, access protected pages only accessible to logged in users, stay logged in when they close the app or refresh the page.

projects.title: Backend API integration
projects.category: Build RESTFul-API with node.js & express, tested by Postman.
